description: This file declares the HttpClient class within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace, providing static methods for HTTP operations (GET, POST, DELETE, PUT). It serves as an interface for making HTTP requests with authentication tokens and managing responses.

classes.name: HttpClient
classes.description: A class providing static methods for executing HTTP requests (GET, POST, DELETE, PUT) with authentication support and response handling.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Performs an HTTP GET request to the specified URL with an authentication token, filling response and responseHeader with the server's reply.

methods.name: Post
methods.description: Performs an HTTP POST request to the specified URL with an authentication token and data payload, filling response and responseHeader with the server's reply.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Performs an HTTP DELETE request to the specified URL with an authentication token, filling response and responseHeader with the server's reply.

methods.name: Put
methods.description: Performs an HTTP PUT request to the specified URL with an authentication token and data payload, filling response and responseHeader with the server's reply.
